title: Application of Language-Based Representative Learning Models for Sports Training Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of advanced-level theories (including linguistic analysis) and high-level applied skills (text/audio data processing)
context.additional_context: Sports training design simulation linked to language curricula, optimizing training environments using learners' reading comprehension and expressive skills

learning_goals: Design and integrate at least three training tasks reflecting real-game conditions with a linguistic feedback system
Evaluate training environments using an Apriori algorithm-based rule model and perform text data pattern analysis

Learners explain three methodologies (e.g., app log collection, user feedback system, crowdsourcing) for collecting voice/text training data in smartphone environments, design an analysis process with ≥85% accuracy for quality assessment, and evaluate vocabulary frequency and contextual consistency

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
